name: Caption Editor
description: Telegram bot to edit your Channel files caption

API_ID.description: Enter your API ID , Get it from https://my.telegram.org

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your bot token, as a string.

OWNER_ID.description: give your telegram user id here

OWNER_USERNAME.description: give your telegram user name here without @ , If you don't have Username leave this empty

FILES_CAPTION.description: Enter your Files Custom Caption here

BUTTON_URL.description: Your channel or Group link Here

BUTTON_NAME.description: Enter URL button Name here ... Like NS Bots
